```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


# Exercise 1.1
```{r, Exercise 1.1}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979")
```

#Exercise 1.2
```{r, Exercise 1.2}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada" | 
         country == "New Zealand" | 
         country == "United States") %>%
  filter(year >= "1970" &
           year <= "1979") %>%
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```


#Exercise 1.3
```{r, Exercise 1.3}
gapminder %>%
  arrange(country, year) %>%
  mutate(increaselifeExp = lifeExp -lag(lifeExp)) %>%
  filter(increaselifeExp < 0)
```


#Exercise 1.4
```{r, Exercise 1.4}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  filter(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap))
```


#Exercise 1.5
```{r, Exercise 1.5 load}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```

```{r, Exervise 1.5}
gapminder %>%
  filter(country == "Canada") %>%
  ggplot(aes(lifeExp, gdpPercap)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_y_log10("GDP per Capita")
```
